requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or better; best played in compatibility mode
  • Processor: 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 by 768
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Max display resolution is 1024 by 768. Best played in windowed mode
